channel.title: Modeler wanted
channel.description:
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/infection2[/url]
Hello! I am a mapper for the mod infection, and currently, our team really needs a modeler. a lot of our future work requires that we find someone.
what we need is: -source engine modeler -make physics/static props for mapping -make v/w models for weapons (not as much a requirement, if you can model for source engine at all we would still love to have you.)
any help is greatly appreciated, post here, and/or get in touch with any member of the mod team on moddb
[url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/infection2[/url]
thank you!

item.title: Modeler wanted
item.dc:creator: Sgt_smiles
item.description:
Jeannotvb:

You should start modelling yourself, I found myself in a shitty situation aswell when I needed modellers/texture artists/animators - now I’m doing it myself.

I have used blender before, i forgot most of it but I’m sure i could learn it back. I actually did pretty well with it. once i got to wrapping skins and exporting for source (still don’t know how to do that with blender), and all the other annoying parts of modeling, i quit. Having ADD really sucks, i wish i could just get on board with something and stick with it, but once i hit a roadblock, i quit. i only kept going with mapping for source because it was easiest.

i mean, with coding, you need to find the proper programs, get an exporter, learn an entire language. and with modeling you need a decent program, or several to get it entirely exported, and you need to know your whole way around it. i can make pictures, but i don’t have photoshop any more.

if anything i would want to learn how to code, but its been the hardest for me to get a grip on. i try to read the book i bought, but i get distracted by a kitten or some video games. i try to remember what im reading, but it all goes away, i try to make learning it a little more of a daily thing but school and other obligations get in the way.

:fffuuu:

i just had a mental breakdown, w/e now you know my situation, no money, lazy, ADD, school, all that jazz.

Read full topic
